variable.name: FN455
variable.value: CLASS 1 - ORDINARY PHYSICAL ACTIVITY, DOES NOT CAUSE SYMPTOMS
CLASS II - ORDINARY PHYSICAL ACTIVITY, RESULTS IN SYMPTOMS
CLASS III - LESS THAN ORDINARY PHYSICAL ACTIVITY RESULTS IN SYMPTOMS
CLASS IV - ANY PHYSICAL ACTIVITY RESULTS IN SYMPTOMS
